channel.title: Arguments?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/30wbmmu.jpg[/img]
I'm pretty sure I need to set up arguments, but I just have no idea. I have been chasing this all day long, testing every possible combination, looking for answers around the web, fixing compiler then the run breaks. Fix a run then everything else breaks. If anyone has some insight, haha.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/s3ld0z.png[/img]

item.title: Arguments?
item.dc:creator: @nuclearwar nuclearwar
item.description:
@nuclearwar wrote:

I do not have a True False True Scenario, this is what my Source->Run.bat looks like.

@echo off title Nuclearwar-Scape color 0a echo ------------------------------------------------------------- echo Attempt to get both compilers and runs to work echo echo ------------------------------------------------------------- echo UPDATES: echo fixed ALOT OF GLITCHES AND BUGS echo added custom bosses and monsters echo alot of custom commands echo about everything you can think of echo ------------------------------------------------------------- echo Nuclearwar-Scape ~ By NuclearWar echo ------------------------------------------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Arguments?
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

Look in your source > run.bat, scroll across and you should see 3 words, they will be like this:

Put the three words (trues and falses) in there with a space between the word into ‘Program Arguments’

If this is not the case, please post your run.bat here!

Read full topic
